publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2022.1# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Scottish History—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2022) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert after "and considers that" ", whilst this matter should be left to the discretion of individual schools,"
